SENT.plain: A 48 year-old white male with basal cell nevus syndrome presented with a metastatic basal cell carcinoma with neuroendocrine features
The tumor manifested aggressive behavior, having deep local invasion and metastases to para-aortic lymph nodes and bone
Neuroendocrine differentiation has rarely been associated with basal cell carcinoma
The histologic, immunohistochemical, and electron microscopic studies of this rare tumor are described
